member.name: T:Topshelf.Log4NetConfigurationExtensions
member.summary: Extensions for configuring MassTransit for log4net

member.name: M:Topshelf.Log4NetConfigurationExtensions.UseLog4Net(Topshelf.HostConfigurators.HostConfigurator)
member.summary: Specify that you want to use the Log4net logging engine for logging with MassTransit.

member.name: M:Topshelf.Log4NetConfigurationExtensions.UseLog4Net(Topshelf.HostConfigurators.HostConfigurator,System.String)
member.summary: Specify that log4net should be used for logging MassTransit messages
member.param: The name of the log4net xml configuration file
